topic.title: Request Status Information for a Resource

keywords.indexterm: SVN Clientobtain information regarding a resourcerequest status information

body.p: While you are working you often need to know which files you have changed, added, removed or renamed, or even which files got changed and committed by others. That's where the Synchronize action from Working Copy view comes in handy. The Working Copy view will show you every file that has changed in any way in your working copy, as well as any unversioned files you may have.

If you want more detailed information about a given resource you can use the Information action from the Working Copy view contextual menu. A dialog called SVN Information will pop up showing remote and local information regarding the resource, such as:

ul.li: last change author, revision and date

body.p: The value of a property of the resource displayed in the dialog can be copied by right clicking on the property and selecting the Copy action.
A less detailed list of information is also presented when you hover with the mouse pointer over a resource and the tooltip window is displayed.
